item.title: Help with blitz fix
item.dc:creator: @iwolfi iwolfi
item.description:

yes before you ask my source is deltascape please dont flame. im trying to perfect this source and make it so its hard to reconize its actully delta

anyway to my problem well i want gfx round me when i cast the blitz spell like this
